docs.text: buffalo ? 66 is a very rarely known movie that stars vincent gallo and christina ricci .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gallo plays a very troubled man , who was sent to jail for gambling .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: once out of jail , he must visit his parents , who he told he was married .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the truth is he isn't married .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: to try to impress them , he kidnaps a girl ( christina ricci ) from a tap dancing class to act as his wife .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film is very cheaply made , and it shows it throughout a lot of the movie , but you don't need money to make a good film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: buffalo ? 66 doesn't always stay with the realistic concept , and sometimes goes through outrageous events .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gallo's parents , played by angelica huston and ben gazarra , are two very strange individuals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the mother plays a football fanatic and the father plays a quiet man with odd habits .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gallo and ricci arrive at his parent's house , and some extremely funny scenes take place within the house .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ricci's performance during the scene at gallo's parent's home are very well done .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there is constantly humor involved in the interesting dinner table scenes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the way the movie was filmed in this particular part of the movie were interesting and creative .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they seemed very mediocre , but they worked out just fine .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gallo's character is developed very well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the impression that he is very depressed and confused is very clear .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gallo gives a performance that makes you believe what the character is going through .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his character goes through many , many problems , just like many people in real life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this character seemed very realistic to me .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ricci's character is funny and different .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she doesn't care much that she has been kidnaped , in fact , she falls in love the man who kidnaped her !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ricci is a very wonderful actress and she is starting to get the recognition that she deserves .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: buffalo ? 66 isn't all laughs though .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many scenes are very dramatic and depressing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gallo's character was so realistic , he was extremely disturbing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: some scenes are supposed to come off as funny , but they actually seemed sad and real to life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film sometimes drags along , not giving much material .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i really would have liked to see gallo's parents a lot more , and i would have liked to see the characters developed more .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: overall , buffalo ? 66 isn't as good as some people put it up to be .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the bottom line- a few hysterical scenes save this film from sinking to the bottom .
docs.label: positive
